Translations.Text: Wo bi yi xingsu fashi!
Zhe que shi yige zhongda de shiyan, jiaru nimen zhidao.
Zhe que shi yi bu zungui de “gulanjing”,
zai yi bu shou baohu de tian jing [“shou baohu de xian pai”] zhong,
wei chunjie zhe [ru tianshi] caineng chumo na bu tian jing,
zhe bu “gulanjing” shi congzhong shijie zhi zhu jiang shi de.
Nandao nimen [bu xinyang zhe] yao fouren zhe yanci [“gulanjing”] ma?
Nimen budan bu ganxie ta [an la] ciyu nimen de jiyang, erqie hai yao fouren ta ma?
Dang [jiang sizhe de] linghun daoda yanhou shi, nimen weihe bu zijiu ne?
Na shi, nimen zhishi guanwang.
Wo [de qu ming de tianshi] bi nimen geng jiejin ta, dan nimen kan bujian.
Jiaru nimen bushi shou shenpan de, jiaru nimen shi chengshi de, nimen weihe bu shi linghun fu fan yuan wei ne?
Ruguo ta [jiang sizhe] shi jiejin an la de ren,
name, ta jiang huode kuaile, jiyang he enze de leyuan.
Ruguo ta [jiang sizhe] shi youshou bian de ren,
name, youshou bian de ren [jiang dui ta shuo]:“Zhu ni ping'an!”
Ruguo ta [jiang sizhe] shi fouren [fuhuo] zhe, mi wu zhe [beili yisilan jiao zhe],
name, tasuo shou de daiyu jiushi feishui,
zai huo yu li bei shaozhuo.
Zhe que shi wu ke huaiyi de zhenli.
Suoyi, ni [mu sheng] dang zansong ni weida de zhu de zun ming [zhu].
Tiandi jian de yiqie dou zansong an la [zhu]. Ta shi quanneng de, zui ruizhi de.
Tiandi de zhuquan shi ta de. Ta neng shi rensheng, ta neng shi ren si. Ta dui wanshi shi wanneng de.
Ta shi qian wu shi hou wu zhong de, shi zui xianzhu de, shi zui yin cun de. Ta shi quanzhi wanshi wanwu de.

Shi ta [an la] zai liu rinei chuangzaole tiandi, ranhou sheng shang baozuo. Ta zhidao shenru dixia de he cong di zhong chuchan de, cong tianshang jiangxia de he sheng shang tiankong de. Wulun nimen zai nali, ta dou yu nimen tong zai. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la shi quan shi de.
Tiandi de zhuquan shi ta de, wanshi zuizhong dou jiang gui dao an la nali qu [shenpan].
Ta shi heiye jinru baizhou, shi baizhou jinru heiye. Ta shi quanzhi [renlei] xiongzhong yiqie de.

Nimen dang xinyang an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng], dang [wei an la zhidao] shiyong ta shi nimen dai guan de caiwu [zhu]. Nimen zhong xinyang bing [wei an la zhi dao] shiyong zhe, tamen jiang huode zhongda de baochou.
Nimen weihe bu xinyang an la ni? Shizhe [mu sheng] yi zhaohuan nimen xinyang nimen de zhu [an la], er ta [an la] que yi dui nimen xunuo, jiaru nimen shi xinshi.
Shi ta [an la] jiang gei ta de puren [mu sheng] mingshi de jing wen, yibian ta [an la] shi nimen cong hei'an zouxiang guangming. An la dui nimen que shi ren'ai de, te ci de.

Nimen weihe bu wei an la zhi dao shiyong ne [zhu]? Tiandi jian de yiqie [yichan] dou shi an la de. Nimen zhong gongke [mai jia] qian shiyong bing canzhan zhe, tong qita ren [gongke mai jia hou shiyong bing canzhan zhe] shi bu xiangdeng de. Zhexie ren [gongke mai jia qian shiyong bing canzhan zhe] bi cihou shiyong bing canzhan zhe juyou geng gao de pinji. Dan an la dui mei zhong ren dou xu gei youmei de baochou. Fanshi nimen suo zuo de, an la shi che zhi de.
Shei wei an la [zhi dao] juanxian yi bi shan kuan, ta [an la] bi jiabei ci hai shei,[ciwai] ta hai jiang huode fengfu de baochou [leyuan].

Zai na ri, ni jiang kanjian nannu xinshimen de guanghui zai tamen de qianmian he youbian shanyao.[You hua sheng dui tamen shuo]:“Nimen jintian de xixun shi:[Nimen jiang jinru] zhu heliuguo de leyuan, yong ju qizhong. Zhe que shi weida de chenggong.”

Zai na ri, nannu wei xinzhe [zhu] jiang dui xinshimen shuo:“Qing nimen deng deng women! Rang women zhan yidian er nimen de guanghui ba!” You hua sheng [dui tamen] shuo:“Nimen huiqu xunqiu guanghui ba!” Yushi, tamen [xinshi yu wei xinzhe] zhi jian mashang shu qile yi du qiang, qiang shang you daomen, men nei you enhui, men wai you xingfa.

Wei xinzhe jiang hanjiao xinshimen:“Nandao women yuanlai bu shi tong nimen zai yiqi de ma?” Tamen [xinshi] jiang shuo:“Shi de, dan nimen shi nimen ziji xianrule mihuo zhong, nimen dengdai [women miewang], huaiyi [liu da xinyang deng], wangxiang qipianle nimen, zhidao an la de mingling lailin. Pian zei [emo] ceng jie an la de mingyi qipian nimen.
Jintian, nimen [wei xinzhe] de fajin bu bei jieshou, bu xinyang zhe de fajin ye bu bei jieshou [zhu]. Nimen de guisu shi huo yu, na shi zui shiyi nimen juzhu di difang. Guisu zhen elie!”
